16: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אוּכַ֛ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>I may</n> לָשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>not return</n> אִתָּ֖ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וְלָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>with thee nor go in</n> אִתָּ֑ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אֹ֣כַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>with thee neither will I eat</n> לֶ֗חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>nor drink</n> אִתְּךָ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> מַ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> בַּמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>with thee in this place</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
17: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> דָבָ֤ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>For it was said</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בִּדְבַ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>to me by the word</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תֹאכַ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>Thou shalt eat</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>no bread</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>nor drink</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>there nor turn again</n> לָלֶ֔כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that thou camest</n> בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָלַ֥כְתָּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> בָּֽהּ׃
18: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>He said</n> ל֗וֹ גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נָבִיא֮ <sup>5030 </sup> <n>unto him I [am] a prophet</n> כָּמוֹךָ֒ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> וּמַלְאָ֡ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>also as thou [art] and an angel</n> דִּבֶּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> אֵלַי֩ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> בִּדְבַ֨ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>unto me by the word</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הֲשִׁבֵ֤הוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Bring him back</n> אִתְּךָ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>with thee into thine house</n> וְיֹ֥אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>that he may eat</n> לֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וְיֵ֣שְׁתְּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> כִּחֵ֖שׁ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>[But] he lied</n> לֽוֹ׃
19: וַיָּ֣שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>So he went back</n> אִתּ֗וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַיֹּ֥אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>with him and did eat</n> לֶ֛חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> בְּבֵית֖וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in his house</n> וַיֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drank</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n>

22: וַתָּ֗שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>But camest back</n> וַתֹּ֤אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and hast eaten</n> לֶ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וַתֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drunk</n> מַ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in the place</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of which</n> דִּבֶּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of the which [the LORD] did say</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> תֹּ֥אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to thee Eat</n> לֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>no bread</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>no water</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall not come</n> נִבְלָתְךָ֖ <sup>5038 </sup> <n>thy carcase</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> קֶ֥בֶר <sup>6913 </sup> <n>unto the sepulchre</n> אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of thy fathers</n>

29: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>took up</n> הַנָּבִ֜יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>And the prophet</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִבְלַ֧ת <sup>5038 </sup> <n>the carcase</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַיַּנִּחֵ֥הוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and laid</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הַחֲמ֖וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>it upon the ass</n> וַיְשִׁיבֵ֑הוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and brought it back</n> וַיָּבֹ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to the city</n> הַנָּבִ֣יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>prophet</n> הַזָּקֵ֔ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and the old</n> לִסְפֹּ֖ד <sup>5594 </sup> <n>to mourn</n> וּלְקָבְרֽוֹ׃ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>and to bury</n>
30: וַיַּנַּ֥ח <sup>3240 </sup> <n>And he laid</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִבְלָת֖וֹ <sup>5038 </sup> <n>his carcase</n> בְּקִבְר֑וֹ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>in his own grave</n> וַיִּסְפְּד֥וּ <sup>5594 </sup> <n>and they mourned</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> ה֥וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>over him [saying] Alas</n> אָחִֽי׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>my brother</n>
31: וַיְהִי֮ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after</n> קָבְר֣וֹ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>he had buried</n> אֹתוֹ֒ <sup>853 </sup> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him that he spake</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> בָּנָיו֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to his sons</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בְּמוֹתִי֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>When I am dead</n> וּקְבַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>6912 </sup> <n>then bury</n> אֹתִ֔י <sup>853 </sup> בַּקֶּ֕בֶר <sup>6913 </sup> <n>me in the sepulchre</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>wherein the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> קָב֣וּר <sup>6912 </sup> <n>[is] buried</n> בּ֑וֹ אֵ֚צֶל <sup>681 </sup> <n>beside</n> עַצְמֹתָ֔יו <sup>6106 </sup> <n>my bones</n> הַנִּ֖יחוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>lay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַצְמֹתָֽי׃ <sup>6106 </sup> <n>his bones</n>
32: כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָיֹ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall surely</n> יִהְיֶ֜ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>come</n> הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>For the saying</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> קָרָא֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>which he cried</n> בִּדְבַ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>by the word</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>against the altar</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>in Bethel</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּתֵּ֣י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and against all the houses</n> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>of the high places</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּעָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>which [are] in the cities</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> פ
33: אַחַר֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>After</n> הַדָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>this thing</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>returned</n> יָרָבְעָ֖ם <sup>3379 </sup> <n>Jeroboam</n> מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> הָרָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>not from his evil</n> וַ֠יָּשָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>again</n> וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>but made</n> מִקְצ֤וֹת <sup>7098 </sup> <n>of the lowest</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priests</n> בָמ֔וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>of the high places</n> הֶֽחָפֵץ֙ <sup>2655 </sup> <n>whosoever would</n> יְמַלֵּ֣א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>accomplish</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>able</n> וִיהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כֹּהֲנֵ֥י <sup>3548 </sup> <n>him and he became [one] of the priests</n> בָמֽוֹת׃ <sup>1116 </sup> <n>of the high places</n>
34: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> בַּדָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And this thing</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> לְחַטַּ֖את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>became sin</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto the house</n> יָרָבְעָ֑ם <sup>3379 </sup> <n>of Jeroboam</n> וּלְהַכְחִיד֙ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>even to cut [it] off</n> וּלְהַשְׁמִ֔יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>and to destroy</n> מֵעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>off</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[it] from off the face</n> הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> פ
